title: HandScape Exceeds KickStarter Goal and Closes $2M Round for HandyCase™: First and Only Mobile Case Series Enabling Front and Backside Touch Controls for iPhones and iPads
text:
Thumbnail October 13, 2015 02:51 PM Eastern Daylight Time 
FREMONT, Calif.--( BUSINESS WIRE )--HandScape, makers of HandyCase, the world’s first and only mobile case series that enables front and backside touch controls for iPhones and iPads, today announce that they recently closed their first round of funding for $2M and separately exceeded their Kickstarter goal in late in September. HandScape expects its final surge of backers in the last week of the campaign as the company focuses on the production and delivery. The company recorded reaching the $100,000 crowdfunding goal in less than 3 weeks and immediately made the ‘Top 10 KickStarter Campaigns You Should Back Right Now’ list by KrowdFund.com . 
“Our technology will eventually allow everyone to tap and swipe ergonomically and with ease, on both sides of every touch-controlled mobile device in the market,” said Min Hui, CEO of HandScape. 
HandScape has recently updated their SDK to encourage more Games and App Developers who seek to raise the levels of engagement and monetization in their products. The HandyCase is a unique mobile device case, smart and designed to be attractive, ergonomic, rugged and allow 1- and 2-handed interaction with virtually any application that utilizes the HandScape API. The SDK currently supports Cocos2d, Cocos3d and Unity3d games engines. 
“We foresee advance and innovative applications for Games, Education, Camera Apps, Physical Rehabilitation and so many more,” said Tong Luo, Founder and CTO of HandScape. “The growing issue of repetitive trauma syndrome along with developers constantly racing to make games more engaging is now addressed with our patented technology,” he adds. The company also looks to partner with more Game Developers today. 
HandyCase Pricing and Availability HandyCase for iPads and iPhones from $99Mass production units are available on 2Q2016Volume pricing available 
About HandScape, Inc. 
HandScape was founded in 2013. The company makes innovative mobile device cases that enable full front and back side touch controls. HandScape’s HandyCase™ is the world’s first and only touch-enabled case series for iPhone and iPads. HandScape holds 27 international patents today and can be integrated into OEM tablets, car consoles, wearable computer, toys, gaming consoles, etc. The company’s FREE SDK is now available to download from their website. The company is headquartered in Fremont, CA. For more information, visit http://www.HandScape.com .
